    DistanceSensor_A02YYUW_MEASSUREMENT_STATUS dstStatus;
        if (dstStatus != DistanceSensor_A02YYUW_MEASSUREMENT_STATUS_OK)
        (dstStatus != DistanceSensor_A02YYUW_MEASSUREMENT_STATUS_OK) &&
    if (dstStatus == DistanceSensor_A02YYUW_MEASSUREMENT_STATUS_OK)
        dstStatus = distanceSensor.meassure();
// by Linar Yusupov
